name: full-test
description: trying first full test of isomorphic react

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf dist/components && rm -rf dist/reducers && rm -rf dist/actions
scripts.build:server: babel src/server -d dist && babel src/client/components -d dist/components && babel src/client/reducers -d dist/reducers && babel src/client/actions -d dist/actions

author: Dan Marcus
